page.title: 08Employment-Local area
page.content: In our Domesday Block we have 4 main areas of habitation:-Sutton-at-Hone, Swanley Village and parts of Hextable and Swanley. We wanted to find out how settled the population was and our survey discovered that the numbers of people who had always lived in the area,was slightly less than those who have moved into the area. We found that most people who have moved into our area originally came from London,or other parts of Kent.Only a few had come from other parts of England,or other countries. We asked people what jobs they did, and found a wide range of different occupations.Quite a number of people seemed to have manual or clerical jobs. About 15% of those questioned had professional jobs and there were quite a lot of housewives.
